ThingDef.label: ricotta
ThingDef.description:
A soft, creamy cheese with a mild flavor, often used in both savory and sweet dishes like pasta, pastries, and desserts. Very quick to make from milk, and a fast, easy way to make a profit from it.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 5 ricotta requires 1.25 nutrition from milk, with an average total value of 47.50, and sells for 12, giving a <color=#33CC33>20.83%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Value per work:</color> Recipe requires 100 work, which results on a value per work of <color=#33CC33>0.60</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.1 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>180</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> Profit per day will depend on the animal producing the milk. With cows, it will be <color=#33CC33>1.40</color> (for reference Yayo is 0.35, but cows need to be fed too).

ThingDef.label: sour cream
ThingDef.description:
A tangy, creamy dairy product made by curdling milk with vinegar, offering a rich texture and flavor perfect for enhancing both savory and sweet dishes.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 5 sour cream requires milk and vinegar with a total value of 79, and sells for 30, giving a <color=#33CC33>47.33%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Value per work:</color> Recipe requires 1500 work, which results on a value per work of <color=#33CC33>0.10</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.1 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>300</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> On average, profit per day is <color=#33CC33>0.91</color> (for reference Yayo is 0.35).

ThingDef.label: kefir
ThingDef.description:
A tangy, probiotic-rich fermented milk drink, made by culturing milk with kefir grains. Known for its creamy texture and health benefits.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 10 kefir requires 50 milk with a total value of 95, and sells for 17, giving a <color=#33CC33>44.12%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Fermentation time:</color> 13.33 days.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.2 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>85</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> On average, profit per day is <color=#33CC33>0.44</color> (for reference Yayo is 0.35).

ThingDef.label: lassi
ThingDef.description:
A traditional, creamy yogurt-based drink, often flavored with fruits or spices. It's a refreshing blend of sweet or savory ingredients, perfect for cooling off and aiding digestion.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 10 lassi requires 20 yoghurt with a total value of 600, and sells for 80, giving a <color=#33CC33>25.00%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Fermentation time:</color> 15 days.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.15 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>533.33</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> On average, profit per day is <color=#33CC33>1.33</color> (take this number with a pinch of salt. It's hard to estimate milk + fruit + yoghurt + fermentation, so it just assumes you are swimming in yoghurt).
